Question
========
The researcher wants to reduce the 7-point scale for statement 2 (variable: statement2) to a 5-point scale: answer options 1 and 2 are merged into option 2 and answer options 6 and 7 are merged into option 6. The remaining options, 3, 4 and 5, remain the same. Calculate the average exam grade for knowledge literacy (variable knowledge_theory) for the students in the new option 2 of proposition 2. Write your answer in the answer box (using 5 decimal places).

* Download**: [SPSS file](eur-descriptive-233-en-data.sav), [CSV file](eur-descriptive-233-en-data.csv)


Solution
========
The correct answer is 4.62320
